Bash(python3.12 -c "
from nano_banana_helper import configure_nano_banana, generate_image

configure_nano_banana\(''AIzaSyCUs2NR6xFjLkREtyL8AegHL39OyMhBwh8''\)

# Product image - sleek charger device
prompt = ''''''A sleek, premium carbon fiber shoe charger device called ''Snow Drop''. 
Modern minimalist design with a dark charcoal/black body and a glowing cyan LED slot where shoes would sit.
The device has soft cyan and purple ambient lighting effects around it.
Product photography style, dark background, dramatic lighting, high-end tech aesthetic.
Clean professional product shot, no text or labels.''''''

img_data = generate_image\(
    prompt=prompt,
    output_path=''images/product_charger.png''
\)

if img_data:
    print\(f''Product image generated: {len\(img_data\)} bytes''\)
else:
    print\(''Failed to generate product image''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import os
from pathlib import Path

os.environ[''NANO_BANANA_API_KEY''] = ''AIzaSyCUs2NR6xFjLkREtyL8AegHL39OyMhBwh8''

from google.genai import Client, types

client = Client\(api_key=os.environ[''NANO_BANANA_API_KEY'']\)

response = client.models.generate_content\(
    model=''gemini-2.5-flash-image'',
    contents=[''A minimal 32x32 pixel favicon of a simple snowflake. Cyan \(#00E5FF\) to purple \(#A855F7\) gradient. Clean geometric 6-pointed snowflake design on white background. Very simple, minimal details, suitable for tiny favicon size.''],
    config=types.GenerateContentConfig\(
        temperature=0.7,
        response_modalities=[''TEXT'', ''IMAGE''],
    \),
\)

for part in response.parts:
    if part.inline_data is not None:
        Path\(''favicon.png''\).write_bytes\(part.inline_data.data\)
        print\(''PNG Favicon generated!''\)
        break
")
